skills.name: Create Project
skills.pattern:
npm create vite@latest my-app -- --template react-ts
# Templates: vanilla, vue, react, preact, lit, svelte

skills.name: Vite Config
Commands
skills.pattern:
npm run dev      # Dev server
npm run build    # Build
npm run preview  # Preview build

skills.name: Environment
skills.pattern:
# .env
VITE_API_URL=https://api.example.com

// In code
import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL

skills.name: Path Aliases
CSS Processing
Dev Proxy
HMR Config
Build Options
Manual Chunks
Dynamic Import
skills.pattern:
const Module = React.lazy(() => import('./Module'));

<Suspense fallback={<Loading />}>
  <Module />
</Suspense>

skills.name: Asset Handling
Glob Import
skills.pattern:
const modules = import.meta.glob('./modules/*.ts');
const eager = import.meta.glob('./modules/*.ts', { eager: true });

skills.name: Web Workers
skills.pattern:
import Worker from './worker?worker';
const worker = new Worker();

skills.name: Plugin System
SSR Support
Library Mode
PWA Plugin
Bundle Analyzer
skills.pattern:
import { visualizer } from 'rollup-plugin-visualizer';

plugins: [visualizer({ open: true })]

skills.name: Legacy Support
skills.pattern:
import legacy from '@vitejs/plugin-legacy';

plugins: [legacy({ targets: ['defaults', 'not IE 11'] })]

skills.name: HTTPS Dev
JSON Import
skills.pattern:
import data from './data.json';
import { key } from './data.json';

skills.name: SVG Component
skills.pattern:
import Logo from './logo.svg?react';

<Logo className="logo" />

skills.name: Base URL
skills.pattern:
base: '/my-app/',
// Or CDN: 'https://cdn.example.com/'
